articles.title: Injectable microrobot could develop bones to treat fractures - Invasion News
articles.description: In a study published in the scientific journal Advanced Materials , researchers from the University of Linköping (Sweden) described the creation of a microrobot that can develop its own bones to help regenerate patients with bone fractures. Why do our bones c…
